title: Uncoated Anti-Acid Shield
content: Uncoated Anti-Acid Shield is a Quest Item used in the Spider's Nest quest. The shield can be made on a Workbench, requiring 1 Rugged Ash Plank and level 32 Carpenter. Players must also have obtained the Carpentry Instructions from Hamish Truefire before they know how to make the shield. Only two shields are able to be made.
